plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                      For the First Circuit


No. 05-2000

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Appellee,

                                v.

                         LIONEL CORMIER,

                      Defendant, Appellant.




                           ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on November 17, 2006, is
amended as follows:

     On page 2, line 3, "18 U.S.C. § 841(a)" should be replaced
with "21 U.S.C. § 841(a)"

     On page 2, line 4, "18 U.S.C. § 846" should be replaced with
"21 U.S.C. § 846"

     On page 6, footnote 2, line 1, "21 U.S.C. § 922(g)" should be
replaced with "18 U.S.C. § 922(g)"

     On page 13, line 7, "the Dyer robbery" should be replaced with
"the Kane robbery"

     On page 13, line 12, "Finch's bail" should be replaced with
"Gleason's bail"

     On page 13, footnote 3, line 2, "18 U.S.C. § 841(a)(1)" should
be replaced with "21 U.S.C. § 841(a)(1)"
